name: WM_MobileApp_Automation_Template
description: Checks Node, Java, Android Studio, and Emulator versions against config.js, run the sample Login scenario Test case

scripts.setup-android: shx echo 'export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk' >> ~/.zshrc && shx echo 'export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk' >> ~/.zshrc && shx echo 'export PATH=$ANDROID_HOME/emulator:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/tools:$PATH' >> ~/.zshrc

author: Vara Sharma
